headline: Colgate-Palmolive (CL): Margin Expansion Strengthens Case for Undervaluation Versus Community Narrative
summary: Colgate-Palmolive (CL) reported steady financial results, with earnings growing at a 2.2% annual rate over the past five years and a 2.4% uptick in the latest year. Looking ahead, analysts expect EPS to climb by 6.79% per year, while profit margins for the most recent period stand at 14.5%, up from 14.2% previously. Although revenue growth of 3.3% per year is projected, that pace trails the broader US market. Investors may notice that shares currently trade at $77.05, which is a notable...
